text:
To start, in the future I want to be sport reporter so I came to Paris in this licence for study thecommunication in the medias, in the socials medias.
My inspirations are the football journalist on bein sports or rmc sport or canal +. More recently the emergence of the formula one, show to all the Paris that the F1 is a real sport who give real emotions. In Paris, the passion of Alex Dupont, reporter on Canal +, transmit the real emotion of the Formula 1. And he have a ritual before the race that is say the same phrase who is « Montez le volume et rendez vous au premier virage ». So when you watch all the GP that give you the adrenaline and your cardio is climbing.
This is all the role of the reporter, give emotions to people who watch the match or the event.
My sport of predilection where I know a lot of things is the football. So reporter I love bein sports reporter’s like Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont or Alex Dupont. They transmits their passions and their connaissances and when you watch a game you are very concentrated because yo have to listen all the things that they say. So watch a game in every sports in not really watch a game, it’s learn like in a classroom.
So I want to do it because I have connaissances and I want to share to the world, to the sport passionate people the ADN of sports.
Another inspiration, is all the athletes because I want to learn how they do to be too strong, too good, too constant all the years. So learn behind they that a big motivation for me. I love sports and I want to do this work because all my life, on the TV, on the Radio, in the really life I have met people who transmit me the passion of sport, for example I love sport because of my dad who love sport too. So sport is also a part of my education.
If I don’t succeed to be sport reporter, I want to be war reporter because all my time in school serve to me to know the importance of the liberty and of the chance who I have to go to school freely. So for the children who can’t go in school because there is the war in their country, I want to show that this is not easy for their to live a normal life.
For finish, after my years in Paris I want to go on a reporter school in Paris but before I have a lot of things to accomplish in Paris.
